creator: LINGUAFOX, SOCIETATEA CU RASPUNDERE LIMITATA
descriptionHtml:
🎉🎉🎉Loved and trusted worldwide 🎄🎄🎄

🍕“Learn English Vocabulary” was named App of the Year by Facebook.

🎁 Beginner or advanced learner, traveler or business professional - This American English app works great and dynamically adjusts to your needs.

💦Why “Learn English Vocabulary”? Because we build bridges between people by making language learning fun and easy through technological innovation.

🍷 Learn a new language by reading different stories in a language of your choosing!

🪢 Learn a language no matter what experience level: beginner, intermediate, expert.

🫕 Read stories in YOUR language to reference what a word or phrase means.

💝 Have a spare 5 minutes a day to learn some new words?

🫕 Enjoy a selection of over 880,000 flash cards: pick the words and memorize them with a one-of-a-kind spaced repetition technique.

🍭No more cramming, stress and angry teachers! With “Learn English Vocabulary” you will learn the language whenever and wherever, at your own pace. You will improve your English and feel the beauty of knowing another language - from freedom while traveling to a higher paying job.

🎠🎢🧶🪢 Here are the key features that make“Learn English Vocabulary” a great tutor for you:

🍼🍷🧊🥃 Books and Audiobooks

🌞 Spanish, French, German and more languages on easy to listen audiobooks.

🌞 Listen to audiobooks in any language even if your phone is sleeping.

🌞 Learn languages by following the reader of the audio book with a karaoke style animation to know exactly what they are saying.

🌞 Spanish audio books combined with English, French audio books combined with German – the choice and what language audio book you want to read is yours!

🌞 “Learn English Vocabulary”’s library offers over 38 English books.

🌞 You can pick any difficulty, (from Basic to Advanced) then choose the genre you are most interested in and finally start reading & learning.

🌞A word you don’t know? It’s is not an issue. Just one tap on the word to see its’ translation and another tap to add it to your “To-Learn” list.

🌞 Trouble with pronunciation? That’s why we have audiobooks that will drastically improve your speaking abilities!

🌞 Reading and listening are two cornerstones of learning English .


🌞 Crystal-clear audio and professional voice actors.
» Learn the right American English pronunciation from conversations between native speakers.

🌞 State-of-the-art Speech Recognition.
» “Learn English Vocabulary” knows exactly how to listen to your American English words and phrases. You will only get a positive feedback if you speak American English clearly and correctly. This will improve your pronunciation.

🌞 Useful phrases for real situations. Memorizing hundreds of isolated words is not the way to go when it comes to learning American English. “Learn English Vocabulary” teaches you American English vocabulary by offering you core words and phrases. Our American English language learning apps break the learning process down into short lessons and puts them into themed packs.

🌞 100% illustrated: Pictures directly carry the meaning - you don’t have to use your native language at all! No intermediary. Faster, more effective and of course more fun! :)

👍Qucik: Keyboard typing is painfully slow. Welcome rapid swipes and taps! Trust us, you’ll need those extra seconds during the quick learning session ;)

👍Forge a habit: . “Learn English Vocabulary” wants to make you language learning addict. Effectiveness is nothing without a well established habit. We help you build one!

🎅 Any feedback will be greatly appreciated! If you have any concerns, recommendations or complaints just drop us a line at support@linguafox.com and we will work towards making better!
==================
🥇 Privacy Policy: https://lingualfox.com/2022/08/20/privacy-policy/
🥇 Terms of Use : https://lingualfox.com/2022/08/20/terms-and-conditions/

descriptionHtml:
Learn Spanish 🇪🇸🇲🇽, English 🇬🇧, French 🇫🇷, German 🇩🇪, Portuguese 🇵🇹🇧🇷, Italian 🇮🇹, Russian 🇷🇺, American English 🇺🇸, Norwegian 🇳🇴, Danish 🇩🇰, Dutch 🇳🇱, Swedish 🇸🇪, Korean 🇰🇷, Japanese 🇯🇵, Chinese 🇨🇳, Arabic, Greek 🇬🇷, Romanian 🇷🇴, Vietnamese 🇻🇳, Indonesian 🇮🇩, Hindi 🇮🇳, Hebrew 🇮🇱, Polish 🇵🇱, Bulgarian 🇧🇬, Ukrainian 🇺🇦, Hungarian 🇭🇺, Czech 🇨🇿, Croatian 🇭🇷, Finnish 🇫🇮, Persian (Farsi), Afrikaans, Thai 🇹🇭, Turkish 🇹🇷, Bengali 🇧🇩, Catalan, Latin, Latvian 🇱🇻, Lithuanian 🇱🇹, Slovak 🇸🇰, Tagalog 🇵🇭 and Urdu 🇵🇰 for free.

40.000 Books
★ 290 genres of books
Books in various genres make it simple to select your favorite books.
★ Learning vocabularies from books
According to Hulstijin and Laufer (2001), Vocabulary acquired through natural learning will be stored in long-term memory.

★ Stimulating analytical thinking
This is a good way for developing mental concentration while reading, thinking, and analyzing a story.

★ Improving speaking and writing skills

The more you read, the more knowledge you will gain, and the more you will learn how to express and tell logical stories that will captivate listeners due to your impressively rich vocabulary.

★ Refresh our mind
These books are not overly knowledgeable, and you don't have to think too hard to understand them, unlike detective stories or economics books.

1500 vocabulary topics
★ A wide range of topics
With so many topics to choose from, it will help you learn not to be boring and difficult.

★ Using pictures to learn new words
This application is intended for people who want to improve and expand their Vocabulary.

★ Challenging with games
APP has created interesting games to stimulate interest in learning vocabulary in order to avoid boredom with words.

★ New words are combined with visually appealing images.
Learning vocabulary through visually appealing images is an effective way to help learners remember information for a long time.


Privacy Policy: https://letspeak247.com/privacy-policy
Terms of Use: https://letspeak247.com/term-and-conditions

Any feedback is greatly appreciated! If you have any concerns, suggestions, or complaints, please contact us at support@letspeak247.com, and we will do our best to improve the App as soon as possible.
